title: Will newer champions ever get bots?
body: Most new champions don't have bots (Kled,Aurelion,Zed...). WIll bots ever be updated to have those newer champions?

replies.body: We do add new champion bots periodically, but as far as I know, we don't have an exact timeline for that type of addition.

Can I please have Jinx bot and Malzahar bot back in custom games? (and maybe the bots that are available in COOP VS AI also?)

I play customs a lot and id really appreciate it. Thanks.
Dude, imagine a boy trying to competently play Azir lol.
